items.name: Get started with approvals
items.description: Approval flows can help you automate sign-off requests and combine human decision-making with background automation to help business users focus on their core tasks.

items.name: Create and test an approval workflow with Power Automate
items.description: With Power Automate, you can manage the approval of documents or processes across several services, including SharePoint, Dynamics 365, Salesforce, OneDrive for Business, Zendesk, or WordPress.

items.name: Manage sequential approvals with Power Automate
items.description: Some workflows require pre-approval before the final approver is required to sign off.

items.name: Create parallel approval workflows with Power Automate
items.description: In a parallel approval workflow, multiple persons are required to approve items such as invoices, purchase orders, vacation requests, etc. Each person's approval is independent of all other approvers.
